title: BugSplat All day
body: Hey! I need help! How can i fix that? When I press tab, alt or enter key my game crashes, and i cant play.

replies.body: Bugsplats usually occur when something in the game fails to render properly, and that can happy for a variety of reasons including bad drivers.  Go over the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help troubleshoot this towards a fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!
